articles.title: No new coronavirus cases confirmed in Sunderland as city's NHS trust announces no deaths in 18 days - Sunderland Echo
articles.description: One new coronavirus case has been confirmed in Sunderland as the city’s main hospital trust sees a 20th day without any deaths related to the illness.
articles.content:
The latest figures released by Public Health England on Saturday, July 11 show that another case of coronavirus has been confirmed in Sunderland.
